languages.text: "Еретики ищут слабых духом и переманивают их обещаниями спасения. Только вот подобные юкко нетверды и легко бросают оружие, если внушить им подобающий страх. Я знаю пару методов войны, наводящей ужас на противника — ввергни их в трепет, эттфатер, и эти немощные ублюдки позабудут про все свои скверные намерения".

"Heretics seek out those who are weak of spirit and entice them with promises of salvation. But such spineless lot lacks the resolve to fight and will drop their weapons should someone give them reason to fear. The purpose of many tactics in warfare is to sow terror in the enemy ranks, and I know some of these tactics well. Make them quiver, Aett-Vater, and those weaklings will forget all about their heinous intentions."
languages.original_text: "Еретики ищут слабых духом и переманивают их обещаниями спасения. Только вот подобные юкко нетверды и легко бросают оружие, если внушить им подобающий страх. Я знаю пару методов войны, наводящей ужас на противника — ввергни их в трепет, эттфатер, и эти немощные ублюдки позабудут про все свои скверные намерения".

traits.locale_text: "I have seen such quirks before — the heretics seek out those weak of spirit and entice them with the promises of salvation. But such jukko are susceptible not only to the messages of the cult, but to their own fear as well. I know of a few warfare tactics that can instill fear in the enemy — blindfold them and give them a good beating, Aett-Vater., and those feeble bastards will forget all of their vile intentions."

"I have seen such quirks before — the heretics seek out those weak of spirit and entice them with the promises of salvation. Make them quiver, Aett-Vater, and those weaklings will forget all about their heinous intentions."

Make them quiver, Aett-Vater, and those weaklings will forget all about their heinous intentions."

languages.text: “那些异端分子寻找那些精神软弱的人，用救赎的承诺来引诱他们，但这样的乌合之众缺乏战斗的决心。只要有人能让他们感到恐惧，他们就会放下武器。在战争中，许多战术都是为了在敌人的队伍中散播恐怖，而我很熟悉其中的部分手段。所以，让他们战栗吧，狼领，那些懦弱的人很快就会忘记他们的邪恶意图。”
languages.original_text: "Heretics seek out those who are weak of spirit and entice them with promises of salvation. But such jukkos lack the resolve to fight and will drop their weapons should someone give them reason to fear. The purpose of many tactics in warfare is to sow terror in the enemy ranks, and I know some of these tactics well. Make them quiver, Aett-Vater, and those weaklings will forget all about their heinous intentions."

traits.locale_text: “那些异端分子寻找那些精神软弱的人，用救赎的承诺来引诱他们，但这样的乌合之众缺乏战斗的决心。只要有人能让他们感到恐惧，他们就会放下武器。在战争中，许多战术都是为了在敌人的队伍中散播恐怖，而我很熟悉其中的部分手段。所以，让他们战栗吧，狼领，那些懦弱的人很快就会忘记他们的邪恶意图。”

languages.text: «Los herejes buscan a los débiles de espíritu y los seducen con promesas de salvación. Pero esos jukkos carecen de resolución para luchar y soltarán las armas si alguien les da motivos para temer. El propósito de muchas tácticas en la guerra es sembrar el terror en las filas enemigas, y conozco bien algunas de esas tácticas. Haz que tiemblen, Aett-Vater, y esos debiluchos se olvidarán por completo de sus atroces intenciones».
languages.original_text: "Heretics seek out those who are weak of spirit and entice them with promises of salvation. But such jukkos lack the resolve to fight and will drop their weapons should someone give them reason to fear. The purpose of many tactics in warfare is to sow terror in the enemy ranks, and I know some of these tactics well. Make them quiver, Aett-Vater, and those weaklings will forget all about their heinous intentions."

traits.locale_text: «Los herejes buscan a los débiles de espíritu y los seducen con promesas de salvación. Pero esos jukkos carecen de resolución para luchar y soltarán las armas si alguien les da motivos para temer. El propósito de muchas tácticas en la guerra es sembrar el terror en las filas enemigas, y conozco bien algunas de esas tácticas. Haz que tiemblen, Aett-Vater, y esos debiluchos se olvidarán por completo de sus atroces intenciones».

languages.text: 「異端者は、精神の弱い者を探し出し、救いの約束で誘惑するのです。しかし、そのような群衆は戦う覚悟ができておらず、誰かが恐れの種をまけば武器を捨てるでしょう。戦争で使う多くの戦術の目的は、敵陣に恐怖を植え付けることであり、これらの戦術のいくつかをよく知っています。アエット＝ヴァテル、奴らを震え上がらせてやりましょう。そうすれば、それらの柔弱者どもが、自分たちの凶悪な目的をすっかり忘れてしまうでしょう」
languages.original_text: "Heretics seek out those who are weak of spirit and entice them with promises of salvation. But such jukkos lack the resolve to fight and will drop their weapons should someone give them reason to fear. The purpose of many tactics in warfare is to sow terror in the enemy ranks, and I know some of these tactics well. Make them quiver, Aett-Vater, and those weaklings will forget all about their heinous intentions."

traits.locale_text: 「異端者は、精神の弱い者を探し出し、救いの約束で誘惑するのです。しかし、そのような群衆は戦う覚悟ができておらず、誰かが恐れの種をまけば武器を捨てるでしょう。戦争で使う多くの戦術の目的は、敵陣に恐怖を植え付けることであり、これらの戦術のいくつかをよく知っています。アエット＝ヴァテル、奴らを震え上がらせてやりましょう。そうすれば、それらの柔弱者どもが、自分たちの凶悪な目的をすっかり忘れてしまうでしょう」

languages.text: « Les hérétiques préfèrent les simples d'esprit... Ils les font fléchir en leur promettant le salut, mais ces lâches manquent de combativité et lâcheront leurs armes au premier coup de stress. De nombreuses tactiques de guerre consistent à semer la terreur dans les rangs ennemis, et c'est un exercice auquel je suis rompu. Faites-les trembler, Aett-Vater... et ces minables oublieront aussi sec leurs intentions belliqueuses. »
languages.original_text: "Heretics seek out those who are weak of spirit and entice them with promises of salvation. But such spineless lot lacks the resolve to fight and will drop their weapons should someone give them reason to fear. The purpose of many tactics in warfare is to sow terror in the enemy ranks, and I know some of these tactics well. Make them quiver, Aett-Vater, and those weaklings will forget all about their heinous intentions."

traits.locale_text: « Les hérétiques préfèrent les simples d'esprit... Ils les font fléchir en leur promettant le salut, mais ces imbéciles manquent de combativité et lâcheront leurs armes au premier coup de stress. De nombreuses tactiques de guerre consistent à semer la terreur dans les rangs ennemis, et c'est un exercice auquel je suis rompu. Faites-les trembler, aett-vater... et ces minables oublieront aussi sec leurs intentions belliqueuses. »

languages.text: "Ketzer zielen auf jene mit einem schwachen Geist ab und ködern sie mit Versprechungen der Erlösung. Doch diesen Jukkos fehlt die Entschlossenheit zu kämpfen, sie lassen ihre Waffen fallen, sobald ihnen jemand einen Grund dafür gibt. Viele Taktiken im Krieg haben den Ziel, Terror in den Reihen des Feindes zu säen, und ich kenne einige dieser Taktiken gut. Lasst sie erzittern, Aett-Vater, dann vergessen diese Schwächlinge ihre schändlichen Absichten."
languages.original_text: "Heretics seek out those who are weak of spirit and entice them with promises of salvation. But such jukkos lack the resolve to fight and will drop their weapons should someone give them reason to fear. The purpose of many tactics in warfare is to sow terror in the enemy ranks, and I know some of these tactics well. Make them quiver, Aett-Vater, and those weaklings will forget all about their heinous intentions."
